legal_basis: s 66(4) of the Canada Pension Plan
decision_reasoning: administrative error (misaddressed letter) prevented Mr. Torrance from receiving notice and appealing
application_details: Mr. Torrance's disability pension application denied due to administrative error
conclusion_outcome: matter remitted to the Minister for reconsideration under s 66(4)
cause_of_action: administrative error leading to misaddressed letters
procedure_followed: judicial review of the Minister's Delegate decision
result_of_case: case remitted to the Minister for reconsideration with directive to apply remedial powers under s 66(4)
